text:
October 2, 1952
Mr* Wilbur Schramm, Dean
Division of Coroinunic ations
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Wilbur:
Our search for an Executive Director has about narrowed
itself down to Earl Wynn of the University of North Carolina and
Earl has expressed interest in being considered for the job* I
have talked with Si, Allen, and lick and all are of the opinion
that we should attempt to arrange an interview with Earl prior
to the fall meeting of the HAEB* Dick is going to be in Washing-
ton on the 16th of October and Si will be available for the
evening of the 16th and the morning qf the 17th* Our plan is
to ask Earl to meet Burton, Dick, Si and me in Washington on
the evening of the 16th and the morning of the 17th* We should
like you to meet with us if you can* Please let me know by
return mail if it will be possible for you to be there* In
the meantime, I trust you will trace any contact you have
regarding Wym and continue to look for other possibilities*
Do you suppose we might get Bob VanDuyn to meet with
us there also?
My kindest and best regards always.
Sincerely yours.
Gray don Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUOA(FM)
GAtpse
